io.oasp.module.jpa.common.base

Interface LegacyDaoQuerySupport<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - type of the entity.
    Deprecated. 
    is only provided for compatibility with legacy features from AbstractGenericDao for SearchCriteriaTo and paging support. For future usage it is recommended to use the paging API from spring-data directly. This module oasp4j-jpa only contains deprecated classes and will not be maintained anymore in the future.

    @Deprecated
public interface LegacyDaoQuerySupport<E>
    Upgrade Hint: To gain compatibility to old paging support all you need to do is to navigate to your ApplicationDaoImpl and add LegacyDaoQuerySupport<E> to the implements declaration.

    • Method Detail

      • findPaginated

        default PaginatedListTo<E> findPaginated(SearchCriteriaTo criteria,
                                         com.querydsl.jpa.impl.JPAQuery<E> query)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a paginated list of entities according to the supplied criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - contains information about the requested page.
        query - is a query which is preconfigured with the desired conditions for the search.
        Returns:
        a paginated list.
        See Also:
        findPaginated(SearchCriteriaTo, JPAQuery, Expression)

      • findPaginated

        default PaginatedListTo<E> findPaginated(SearchCriteriaTo criteria,
                                         com.querydsl.jpa.impl.JPAQuery<?> query,
                                         com.querydsl.core.types.Expression<E> expr)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a paginated list of entities according to the supplied criteria.

        Applies limit and offset values to the supplied query according to the supplied pagination information inside criteria.

        If a total count of available entities is requested, will also execute a second query, without pagination parameters applied, to obtain said count.

        Will install a query timeout if SearchCriteriaTo.getSearchTimeout() is not null.

        Parameters:
        criteria - contains information about the requested page.
        query - is a query which is preconfigured with the desired conditions for the search.
        expr - is used for the final mapping from the SQL result to the entities.
        Returns:
        a paginated list.

      • createPaginationResult

        default PaginationResultTo createPaginationResult(PaginationTo pagination,
                                                  com.querydsl.jpa.impl.JPAQuery<?> query)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a pagination result for the given pagination and query.

        Needs to be called before pagination is applied to the query.

        Parameters:
        pagination - contains information about the requested page.
        query - is a query preconfigured with the desired conditions for the search.
        Returns:
        information about the applied pagination.

      • calculateTotalBeforePagination

        default Long calculateTotalBeforePagination(PaginationTo pagination,
                                            com.querydsl.jpa.impl.JPAQuery<?> query)
        Deprecated. 
        Calculates the total number of entities the given query would return without pagination applied.

        Needs to be called before pagination is applied to the query.

        Parameters:
        pagination - is the pagination information as requested by the client.
        query - is the query for which to calculate the total.
        Returns:
        the total count, or null if PaginationTo.isTotal() is false.

        Applies the pagination criteria to the given JPAQuery.
        Parameters:

        query - is the JPAQuery to apply to.
